password - Variable in class com.example.littleync.SignupActivity
 
password2 - Variable in class com.example.littleync.SignupActivity
 
passwordLogin - Variable in class com.example.littleync.LoginActivity
 
pauseTimer() - Method in class com.example.littleync.gameActivities.ActionTimerActivity
Pauses the timer
populateExistingDeals() - Method in class com.example.littleync.gameActivities.MarketplaceActivity
Re-populates the ScrollView with the trades read from the DB
postingTrade - Variable in class com.example.littleync.gameActivities.MarketplaceActivity
 
postTrade(String, String, int, int) - Method in class com.example.littleync.gameActivities.MarketplaceActivity
Check that the user and trades have been loaded in properly before proceeding to physically process the trade in the DB
postTradeDB(String, String, int, int) - Method in class com.example.littleync.gameActivities.MarketplaceActivity
Method called for a User to post a new trade; we need to add the new trade to the trades collection in the DB; this will show a helpful toast if the user input negative numbers, if the User does not have enough resources, or if previous trade actions are still being processed; when this method is invoked, it sets a flag, postingTrade, that only resolves once this trade is entirely finished being processed (logically and physically in DB); once done, it also automatically refreshes the trade list
